full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Naufrage Small Craft Harbour Launching Ramp and Wall Reconstruction

[English and French summaries will be provided]

#### Project Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified consultants to submit a proposal for the completion of pre-design services, concept design, design development, and construction documents necessary to support the replacement of the launching ramp (Structure 501) and wall (Structure 403) at the Naufrage DFO Small Craft Harbour, Monticello, Prince Edward Island.

#### Tender Description
The services required for the project include but are not limited to surveying, geotechnical investigation program, and translation services necessary to complete pre-design services (RS-1), concept design (RS-2), design development (RS-3), and construction documents (RS-4). This project is being solicited through the solicitation process against Supply Arrangement (SA) EB129-192368 for Heavy Civil Engineering Services.

#### Invitation and Eligibility
The following firms have been invited to participate in this request for proposals:

* Eastern Designers
* EXP Services Inc.
* Hatch Ltd.
* Harbourside Engineering Consultants

These firms have previously qualified in the Marine Engineering discipline for the province of Prince Edward Island under the aforementioned supply arrangement.

#### Important Dates
* Amendment Date: October 25, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 30, 2023 at 2:00 PM (ADT)
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 06, 2023

#### Considerations
Inclusion with this request, interested firms are invited to electronically submit a proposal along with required information. 3 copies of each electronic submission, along with a scanned copy of the signed original,  must be received by the set closing date. Enclose a print copy of the non-binding letters of intent on or before the closing date with the responded bid. Submission guidelines may be accessed from the Bid Solicitation Website. A signed rendition of all requests of eventual winning vendors will received following end evaluation period. Submission is estimated to take ”same day delivery.


#### Neighbouring Information

All the firms invited to participate in this RFP (Request for Proposal) are also invited to electronically key the published material delivered hosted and shared on our secure bid solicitation website hosted by SPAC.
